subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jeff Kent played in San Francisco from 1997 to 2002 and combined with Barry Bonds to become a formidable hitting tandem. But off the field, they were as distant as teammates could be.
snippet: Jeff Kent played in San Francisco from 1997 to 2002 and combined with Barry Bonds to become a formidable hitting tandem. But off the field, they were as distant as teammates could be.
